user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip with my friends next week. Can you provide me with the 16-day weather forecast for our destination, Denver, Colorado? Also, fetch the current weather data for Denver to help us prepare. Additionally, recommend some local hiking trails in the area and nearby hotels for our stay.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current weather data for Denver, Colorado.
Retrieve the 16-day weather forecast for Denver, Colorado.
Recommend some local hiking trails in Denver, Colorado.
Find and recommend nearby hotels for the stay in Denver, Colorado.
